sense.def:
To install a piece of equipment
pomeni postaviti ali namestiti del opreme, da je pripravljen za uporabo.

seg.quote: We have just installed central heating.

sense.def:
To install someone in an important job or position
pomeni nekomu dati neko nalogo ali položaj.

seg.quote: He installed a man named Briceland as head of the advertisement department.

sense.def:
To install oneself in a place
pomeni naseliti se v nekem kraju.

seg.quote: By now he was installed at 7 New King Street.
